original_table_html:
Today:
Greening		 Tomorrow:
Beyond Greening
Internal Pollution prevention
Eliminating or reducing waste before it is created		 New clean technology
Developing new sets of environmental skills and capabilities
External Product stewardship
Minimizing environmental impact throughout the entire product life cycle		 Sustainability vision
Developing a strategy framework for creating sustainable value
summary_markdown: This table outlines a progression from "Today: Greening" to "Tomorrow: Beyond Greening," differentiating internal and external strategies. Under "Today: Greening," internal efforts focus on "Pollution prevention" through waste reduction, while external efforts involve "Product stewardship," aiming to minimize environmental impact across a product's life cycle. Transitioning to "Tomorrow: Beyond Greening," internal strategies evolve to developing "New clean technology," fostering novel environmental skills. Externally, the focus shifts to a "Sustainability vision," establishing a strategic framework for generating sustainable value. This structure illustrates a conceptual evolution from reactive environmental management to proactive, strategic integration of sustainability.
